parameter.name: enforceAuthentication
parameter.label: Enforce Authentication
parameter.description: Require authorization for all endpoints, even if endpoint-specific authorization is not configured.

parameter.name: defaultBasic
parameter.label: Default Basic Authorization
parameter.description: Default Basic authorization in format username:password, used when endpoint authorization is not configured.

parameter.name: defaultBearer
parameter.label: Default Bearer Authorization
parameter.description: Default Bearer token used when endpoint authorization is not configured.
